item.title: Slow-cooked Pork Carnitas
item.description: This recipe makes a lot and is super easy. A whole roast usually makes enough for a few meals (depending on how many people will be eating it). Leftovers can be refrigerated for 4-5 days. â²ï¸ Prep time: 15 min ğŸ³ Cook time: 8 hr 30 min ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 10-11 Ingredients 2 Â½ lbs. boneless pork shoulder 6 cloves of garlic, cut into slivers 1 Â½ teaspoons cumin Â½ teaspoon sazon Â¼ teaspoon dry oregano Â¾ cup low sodium chicken broth 2-3 chipotle peppers in adobo sauce 2 bay leaves Â¼ teaspoon dry adobo seasoning Directions Season pork with kosher salt and pepper.
